snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include illegal rental listings on Airbnb, I.B.M. cleaning up Watson's language and Polaroid's plan to open retail...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include illegal rental listings on Airbnb, I.B.M. cleaning up Watson's language and Polaroid's plan to open retail stores to print photos from cellphones.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Fertility Start-Up and Polaroid's New Plan
